revision.revremark: added Medium speed element to Diverging Clear

aspect.name: Stop and Proceed
aspect.indication: Stop before any part of train or engine passes the signal then proceed at restricted speed through the entire block.

aspect.name: Flashing Stop and Proceed
aspect.indication: Stop. Block occupied. Proceed at restricted speed.

aspect.name: Flashing Stop and Proceed Div
aspect.indication: Stop. Block occupied. Proceed at restricted speed.
aspect.comment: Unofficial Name to provide for Diverging aspect in route-signal system

aspect.name: Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop before any part of train or engine passes the next signal. Trains exceeding 40 MPH must immediately reduce to that speed.

aspect.name: Advance Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to pass next signal at not exceeding 40 miles per hour.

aspect.name: Advance Approach Alt
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to pass next signal at not exceeding 40 miles per hour.

aspect.name: Approach Diverging
aspect.indication: Approach next signal prepared to proceed on diverging route at prescribed speed.

aspect.name: Diverging Clear
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route at prescribed speed.
aspect.reference: Diverging indication for medium speed route, in route-signaling system

aspect.name: Diverging Clear Alt
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route at prescribed speed.
aspect.reference: Diverging indication for lower speed route, in route-signaling system
aspect.comment: Alternate Diverging Clear aspect for lower-speed route

aspect.name: Diverging Advance Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route at prescribed speed prepared to pass next signal at not exceeding 40 MPH.

aspect.name: Diverging Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route at prescribed speed prepared to stop before any part of train or engine passes the next signal.

aspect.name: Restricting Lunar
aspect.reference: Unofficial Name for restricting indication on normal route, in route-signaling system
aspect.comment: Unofficial Name to provide for Normal aspect in route-signal system

aspect.name: Restricting Lunar Div
aspect.reference: Unofficial Name for restricting indication on diverging route, in route-signaling system
aspect.comment: Unofficial Name to provide for Diverging aspect in route-signal system
